thread.title: Creative Director for Marvel Superhero Movie Trailer Announces New, TV Series
thread.title_full: Creative Director for Marvel Superhero Movie Trailer Announces New, TV Series

author: prbuzz.com
title: Creative Director for Marvel Superhero Movie Trailer Announces New, TV Series
text:
LOS ANGELES, California—October 8, 2015—Renowned creative director for Marvel’s superhero movie trailers, Fede Ponce, recently announced his new science fiction and fantasy series. The art director for “The Avengers,” “Iron Man,” and “Thor” franchise trailers is introducing the world into a genre-busting series, that blends magic realism and technology:
“Sebastian: The Slumberland Odyssey.”
This mind-bending, live-action tale is one of a kind and explores a new genre, Sci-Fan (science fiction and fantasy). Fede has more than twelve years of experience in the entertainment industry. He has worked closely with Academy Award-winning writer Zachary Sklar and Pan’s Labyrinth producer Bertha Navarro to ensure his new series is a success.
Having worked on some of the biggest blockbusters to date, Fede is been able to tap into the industry’s top artists. Together, they plan to bring the world an unadulterated, fearless series that will touch upon today’s most controversial topics.
This remarkable and ambitious project has been seen on 20 Questions Film, CheatSheet, Artstation and Slashfilm to name a few. “Sebastian: The Slumberland Odyssey” will take the audience on a spectacular adventure through a unique vision of the future and the unexplored realms of the Dreamworld. In order to maintain “Sebastian: The Slumberland Odyssey’s” Integrity. Director Fede Ponce launched one of the most beautiful Kickstarter experiences ever built.. The goal of this project is to raise $220,000 by November 11, 2015. The funds raised will go towards production costs such as equipment, cast and crew, and locations. The campaign has had a very strong response raising $25,000 in only two days.
To become part of this innovative series to life, visit the or click here . Perks are expected to be delivered after production.
This is an “all-or-nothing” deal, which means if the campaign does not reach the funding goal then the project cannot move forward. So know that any amount given can make a difference, and this is an incredible opportunity to be a part of a special campaign! “Sebastian: The Slumberland Odyssey” will reach its goal and you can help by sharing this project on Facebook , Twitter , and other social networks. The more people know about this, the more support the campaign will receive.
Contact: Fede Ponce
Title: Director
